summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing a contract with Masac Nakaso for the sale and removal of certain alder timber, other hardwoods, cottonwood, certain coniferous species and certain salvageable forest materials from City-owned lands in Townships 22 and 23 North, Range 7 East, W.M. and Townships 21, 22 and 23 North, Range 8 East, W.M. and Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W.M. in the Cedar River Watershed.
